alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 4:37AM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR THE HAINES AND SKAGWAY, INCLUDING THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS... .A weather system moving into the panhandle will bring increasing snowfall rates to the northern panhandle through the day on Wednesday, with the heaviest rates expected late Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday night. While accumulating snow will occur in the towns of Haines and Skagway, the greatest totals will be along the Highways at elevation. Freezing rain may mix in for the town of Haines Wednesday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan, including the Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...From noon today to noon AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snow accumulations will be along the Higher elevations of the Haines and Klondike Highways. The heaviest snowfall rates will occur between late afternoon Wednesday and late Wednesday night. Freezing rain may mix in for the town of Haines Wednesday night and early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
